title: new ashe crit runes?
body: heya i just wondered if any1 knew how the crit chance% and crit damage increase% runes affect the new ashe crit damage

replies.body:
take the +% damage you add to a normal champ
reduce it by 45%

example:
if you have a +50% crit damage increase (let's call it Infinity Edge), then +50%*55%=+27,5%.

Not tested yet, but it should work that way. Unless they added some extra weird mechanic to it, in addition to what's on the passive.
Crit Damage% are always going to be the better ones because they go better into the late game.
